# Tutorials

## Coming Soon

Detailed tutorials will be added here, including:

- **Tutorial 1: Your First MMM Model** - Step-by-step guide to training your first model
- **Tutorial 2: Multi-Market Analysis** - Analyzing performance across countries
- **Tutorial 3: Budget Optimization** - Finding optimal budget allocation
- **Tutorial 4: Advanced Transformations** - Tuning adstock and saturation parameters

Check back soon for detailed walkthroughs!
